short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Efficiently Batch URL Opener from a list.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
URLs Manager is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help you manage your browsing experience with ease. With a few simple clicks, you can:

Open Multiple URLs at Once: Launch multiple websites simultaneously by pasting a list of URLs.
Open in Incognito Mode: Open links in incognito mode for private browsing without leaving any trace.
Auto-Scroll Pages: Automatically scroll through pages with a customizable speed for easier reading or data collection.
Create Bookmarks: Save your favorite links quickly by creating bookmarks in your browser with just one click.
Close All Other Tabs: Clean up your workspace by closing all tabs except the current one, keeping your browser organized.
Whether you're working with many tabs or need a streamlined workflow for browsing, URLs Manager is your all-in-one solution. Boost your productivity and enhance your browsing experience today!
